title: 6 must-play PlayStation games heavily discounted in the Summer Sale
description: PlayStation's massive summer sale is here, featuring discounts across hundreds of games.
author: James Carr
excerpt: PlayStation's massive summer sale is here, featuring discounts across hundreds of games.
text: The PlayStation Summer Sale is officially live, running through mid-August, although some deals might expire sooner. This massive sale is taking after the Steam Summer Sale, offering discounts across hundreds of PlayStation games. You can get small discounts on 2025 releases or deep cuts on older games. You can prepare for upcoming PS5 exclusives by picking up the previous game in the series, or just grab a title you missed out on previously. While there are hundreds of discounts to check out, we've narrowed it down to six reccomendations, including heavy discounts on some of the biggest names in gaming, and maybe a game or two you aren't familiar with. Related 5 reasons switching from PC to console makes more sense than ever With the state PC hardware and gaming is in, many gamers are considering a switch to consoles. 6 Ghost of Tsushima Director's Cut Ghost of Yotei is just around the corner Ghost of Tsushima Director's Cut is just under 60% off during the PlayStation Summer Sale, giving you a chance to play through the first game in the series before Ghost of Yotei releases in October. Play as Jin Sakai, a desperate samurai forced to take on the invading Mongols, and pushed to his limits, resulting in him taking a more stealth approach in spite of the samurai honor code. It's an open-world game set on a gorgeous Japanese island. While some of the open-world activities are more tedious than fun, the combat is excellent, and it's worth booting up on PS5 to see the beautiful landscapes in the highest resolution you can. Discounts Ghost of Tsushima Director's Cut - $30 through July 30 Ghost of Tsushima Director's Cut 5 GrimGrimoire OnceMore Vanillaware's real-time strategy game is heavily discounted GrimGrimoire OnceMore is a remaster of Vanillaware's 2007 real-time-strategy game about an academy for wizards. You play as a trainee, Lillet Blan, as you have to fend off invaders in a five-day cycle. It's a bit of a novelty, thanks to its unique 2D viewpoint, which is fairly uncommon for RTS games. It's a Vanillaware title, so it has the developers' distinct and gorgeous hand-drawn art style. It's got a solid narrative told in a visual novel style, but the RTS gameplay is where it really shines. You control units called familiars, coming from the four distinct schools within the main academy. If you like RTS games, or have any affinity for other Vanillaware games like 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim and Unicorn Overlord, this is one worth picking up for a deep discount. Discounts GrimGrimoire OnceMore - $20 through July 30 GrimGrimoire OnceMore 4 Red Dead Redemption 2 If you haven't played Rockstar's epic western, now is the perfect time With Grand Theft Auto 6 coming in May 2026, now is the perfect time to play Red Dead Redemption 2 if you haven't yet. The most modern Rockstar game, Red Dead Redemption 2 serves as a prequel to Red Dead Redemption, following Arthur Morgan as he and the rest of his gang navigate the wild west as it gets less wild. In addition to an incredible story spanning the wild west, Red Dead Redemption 2 is also a strangely deep cowboy simulator. You can fish, hunt, and do other activities in the open-world, experiencing the smaller moments of life in the wild west, while the main story contains action set pieces and intense story moments. Discounts Red Dead Redemption 2 - $15 through July 30 Red Dead Redemption 2 Released October 26, 2018 3 Silent Hill 2 Play Konami's critically acclaimed remake ahead of next Silent Hill game Silent Hill 2 (2024) is a 3D remake of the critically acclaimed horror game from Konami. It's an excellent game, and while there are other survival horror games thriving at the moment, like Resident Evil, Silent Hill 2 is far more focused on psychological horror, something that other survival horror games stay away from. Play as James, who got a mysterious letter from his dead wife, urging him to come find her in Silent Hill, leading to an unraveling mystery and James descends further into madness. While it seems unlikely that there will be any direct story ties, you can still prepare for Silent Hill F later this year by playing through Silent Hill 2, which is half-off on PlayStation. Discounts Silent Hill 2 - $35 through July 30 Silent Hill 2 2 Alan Wake 2 Remedy's modern masterpiece is 60% off Alan Wake 2 is Remedy Entertainment's modern masterpiece, blending survival horror with surreal elements and live-action cutscenes, making for one of the best experiences in gaming of the last five years. My personal game of the year when it released, Alan Wake 2 is now heavily discounted, making it a great time to jump in if you aren't sure if Alan Wake 2 is for you. While playing the first game isn't really that necessary, the remaster is also $5 during the PlayStation Summer Sale, meaning you could get the full Alan Wake experience for under $30. While I don't want to give away some of the fantastic stuff in Alan Wake 2, there is stuff in there you can't get from any other game, including a musical sequence that is truly transcendent. Discounts Alan Wake 2 - $24 through July 30 Alan Wake 2 Released October 27, 2023 1 Octopath Traveler 2 A modern take on classic turn-based RPGs, that everyone should play Octopath Traveler 2 continues to have a bad title, but is an incredible turn-based RPG done in a classic style. Using the HD-2D art-style makes for a gorgeous-looking RPG that has the feel of a classic Final Fantasy or Dragon Quest, while having tons of great modern features. It has eight individual stories to follow featuring the main cast, with some overlapping chapters and a finale that brings everything together. You don't need to play the first game, and I think the story and characters are better in Octopath Traveler 2, but there is a bundle including both games that is also discounted. The combat uses a BP system, where you gain a point by using a normal move, or you can spend points to power up attacks, creating a great push and pull strategy. Discounts Octopath Traveler 2 - $24 through July 30 Octopath Traveler 2 Released February 24, 2023 Tons of fantastic games on sale There are hundreds of games discounted during the PlayStation Summer Sale, so make sure to check out the full selection on the PlayStation store. While some of that is taken up by miscellaneous DLCs and games you might not care about, there are also tons of AAA games and indie darlings available for cheaper than normal. Outside of the Winter sale, this is the biggest PlayStation Store sale of the year, so if you have been waiting, now is the time.
